```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```

```{r}
object = fromJSON("contacts.json")
head(object)
```

```{r}
A = object %>%
  filter(Email != "") %>%
  filter(OrderId != "") %>%
  collect()
```

```{r}
B = object %>%
  filter(OrderId != "") %>%
  filter(Phone != "") %>%
  collect()
```

```{r}
C = object %>%
  filter(Email != "") %>%
  filter(Phone != "") %>%
  collect()
```

```{r}
D = object %>%
  filter(Email != "") %>%
  collect()
```

```{r}
A %>%
  left_join(B, by = "OrderId") %>%
```
